评论详情: Great summer material, very becoming, washable

The white top arrived on time and neatly packaged.  I ordered my regular size and it fits well and is comfortable.  The material is a nice weight, no need to wear a cami.  Fits perfectly in the shoulders.  It looks neat and not sloppy.  Can easily wear with shorts, jeans or skirt.  Great price point as well.
Really like the fit. It is truth to size.
I don’t love this shirt. It fit awkward in the shoulders and arms and seems cheaply made.
Super cute to wear with jeans or dress pants.  Fits larger than expected. Bought a medium. Will order another color in small.
Very comfortable and the fit was perfect
I love these tops and the quality is great.  They dress up or dress down.  Purchased several colors on sale as they are a great go to with jeans or dress pants.

评论概述: Cute and able to dress it up or down
评论详情: Reasonable price for a light weight summer top. The puffs give it texture and makes a plain white top more interesting. Pretty wrinkle resistant. Dries fast post washing. I traveled with this and had access to a washing machine but not a dryer.
Shirt color a little off and size a little big

评论概述: Great shirt but the sleeve elastic is too tight
评论详情: I had this shirt in a larger size and needed to order the next smaller size.  The shirt fits perfectly everywhere except the sleeve opening.  The elastic is super tight, almost 2 sizes too small and leaves indents on my arms (which are not odd sized). I am keeping the top but I will probably have to take it get altered or cut the elastic as I cannot get it to stretch out.  Other than that, I love the top and have gotten compliments on it both time I wore it.
Very comfortable. A little Big but comfortable.
This top exceeded my expectations. The fit is very flattering.  The blouse has a nice lining so that it is not too sheer or see through.
I wear this shirt on repeat and love it every single time I put it on. Well worth the money! And it goes great with everything including jeans and shorts and dressy skirts.

Love the shirt. Completely true when you wash and dry all the wrinkles come out. It’s true to size as I ordered a large and XL because I needed right away and returning the XL. I was going to order 2 or 3 more but and here’s the but, the arm elastic is way too tight. So much so that’s it’s uncomfortable.  That’s the only reason for not getting 5 stars.
Fits perfectly and is great for wearing alone or with a cute cardigan for those days when it’s a tad warm but cool in the evening.
Perfect size. Very comfortable !
It's  unique with the little balls. I like pink. Fits true to size.
I love the fit, style and material.
Nice top..a bit fitted, good value for the price...
Wrinkles would not come out in wash.  It’s not returnable..if tag is removed.
Material was super thin and I couldn't iron out the wrinkles.
I purchased the top to wear to my daughter's college graduation in May.  I am still getting compliments every time I wear it.  Last one was today!

I love the cut and shape of the top! and the little details on it! It’s super flattering! The white one is see through so I used a black tank top underneath. The quality is pretty nice and is very comfortable

I have purchased this shirt in two styles and love them!  I wear them everywhere.  I'm a professional photographer and wear a lot of black to shoot weddings and events.  This shirt is a staple in my closet and I get so many compliments when I wear it.  I also have the flutter sleeve style in a light blue and love it, as well.  Blooming Jelly does a great job with their products and I always love their product.
SUCH A CUTE TOP.
This was a very pretty blouse.  However it was too large for my frame.  Too bad petites
Very soft easy to wash. Got a ton of compliments
Love this brand. Nothing not to like about Blooming Jelly. Really cute and feminine. True to size. Will be ordering more.

It fits perfectly, I’ve washed A couple of times. It  Watches beautifully, no shrinkage, and the color has remained. The color is really pretty exactly as shown. I’ve received a lot of compliments on it.
Good quality, lightweight summer shirt. It’s comfy and doesn’t need ironing.
Great pink color and comfortable shirt
I love this top and the way it fits. It’s true to size and soft material. Lots of compliments, very satisfied.
I received so many compliments on this top. I would definitely recommend ordering for your fall wardrobe.
The shirt is dressy enough and comfortable for work but nothing special. The inner neck lining kept folding out where you could see it.
Unfortunately, the x-large was way bigger than expected so I’m not able to wear it. Otherwise, it looked nice.
Loved this color. The material was a little thicker and harder than I thought it would be. 5ft 2in 110lbs I got a size small. Not too bad for the price.
It was a little clingy and appeared different in person than online

I like the fabric and the fit of this top, however the green “dots” are not the same color as the rest of the top and the shade of them isn’t a color I love. It’s just not a color I would have put with it.

Love this top and it’s just like the product photo. I purchased this cute top to wear to a Bama football game and it fit perfectly! I am 5’9 and around 210 lbs for reference. I have received many compliments on it also. I will definitely be ordering in another color!!!
I love this shirt I actually got it in navy also. Love the way it looks and feels.

I wore this for family photos and it was perfect. I also plan to wear it to work. It looks great with jeans and slacks. Casual or dressed up. Washes well and irons easily when needed. Super happy with this purchase.
This is my new favorite top in my closet. I received so many compliments when I wore it and of course, it goes with everything.
I get so many compliments when I wear this top.  I love it , it’s comfortable and fits true to size.

This top is super cute and true to color but it runs a tad big. I like my clothes fitted and this is roomy. If you are that person who likes extra room or lose clothes stay with your original size. I like fitted or I would've kept it. I am 5'7 and 145 pound and I ordered a medium and needed a small for a more fitted look.
The polka dots are a lighter green than the shirt. Looks like a cactus.
It is a little sheer so a nude bra or tank top is recommended
Liked it but way to large
Cute shirt. Wrinkles are a little hard to get out. It fit true to size. The stitching of the dots on the shirt were a little loose and stringy but the fabric overall was comfortable.

The first top I ordered (in the Dark Wine Red) fit perfectly. Then, I ordered the Magenta color. It fit shorter and tighter. As in the length was shorter by almost the length of my hand. I returned it to try a different color, and ordered the Hot Pink. Loved the color, but good grief it was even shorter and was tight. I tried it on w/o a bra. I don’t think I could have gotten it on with a bra, it was that tight. I ordered the same size in all 3 tops. How do they manage such sizing discrepancy???? If you choose to order this, good luck!!!
The elastic around the arms is a bit tight  other than that it fits well.
Really cute top. Received many compliments. I’m 5’8” 165lbs this fit nice and not see through.
Some threads needed trimmed upon arrival in order to wear.
Lots of compliments on this top.  I needed to wear mermaid green to a book signing and this was the perfect choice! It’s lightweight and good length to be tucked in.

This top is beautiful. I love that the sleeves have some puffiness and dressings about them but the shirt still feels casual enough to wear with jeans. And I also love that the sleeves are not super short as most tops are. They fit just right.
Looks like pictured but little loose for my size. Small still looks bigger than I would like. But comfortable and light weight
Looks good on the model but not on me
This is the second color I’ve ordered this top in. First was black. The quality is great and runs tru to size. I get compliments every time I wear it!

I ordered this in a small and medium , I kept the small it’s fits pretty true too size I usually wear a small on loose fitting shirts. I haven’t worn it yet so I’m hoping it packs well . It’s a very pretty blouse

The fit is perfect and true to size. Really a pretty blouse

I have gotten many compliments on this top. It is roomy for larger hips and plenty long enough to cover my backside. Soft material. No problem with needing to trim the tuffs of material. Came perfectly as advertised. Bought another in black. Highly recommend.
cute, crepe like fabric, little tight overall
I sent this back.  I’m top heavy and with the puffs, it was too much going on.  I thought the pattern would be more subtle but it was too much for me.  Good material and fit, just not for me.
Fit too weird too heavy for summer

I wore this for an interview and got so many compliments, it’s super dressy with black pants and a ballet flat. It doesn’t have much stretch so if you are in between sizes def size up. It’s soft but durable, doesn’t pull and holds up in the washing machine. I do feel like at less than 20 bucks you have a pretty good top!
Beautiful burgundy color and looks great on me! Love the feminine puffed sleeves.

I had ordered this in red and really like it so ordered a white as I needed one. Well it’s not actually a true white but more an off white or cream color. It also was cut a little larger and didn’t fit as well. Also, the material from underneath v-neck area where it comes to point, is not tacked down and keeps showing and I’m always having to tuck it. Need to sew it to fix problem. Should have returned but decided to keep. The red one has no issues and main problem with the white is that it’s not true white.

It is light weight and breathable. the fabric is nice and looks great tucked in or out. Looks great with skirts or jeans.

Soft and hangs beautifully. The color is fabulous. The sleeves are so much fun.
Great fit and the color is beautiful!
This shirt is cute and seems to be well-made. It fits true-to-size and isn't too sheer. I get compliments every time I wear it.
